meta.home_title: Tesoro CRM - Intelligent Lead Generation for Real Estate Professionals
meta.home_description: Tesoro CRM automates property lead generation with AI and maximizes your real estate ROI. MLS integration, automatic compliance and real-time dashboard.
meta.pricing_description: Transparent pricing for AI-powered lead generation. Choose the plan that fits your office. Try free for 14 days.
meta.features_description: Discover all features of Tesoro CRM: AI-powered lead generation, MLS integrations, compliance tools and more. Everything you need for successful lead generation.

mega_menu.your_work_description: What you do daily as a real estate agent.
mega_menu.your_business_description: Growth and insights for your business.

footer.newsletter_description: Get the latest updates and real estate insights
footer.newsletter_privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime.

ai_chat.title: Tesoro AI Assistant
ai_chat.subtitle: Ask a question or search for information
ai_chat.welcome_message: Hello! I'm the Tesoro AI assistant. Ask me a question about our CRM or search for information.
ai_chat.no_results: I couldn't find a specific answer to your question. Try rephrasing it, or check the Knowledge Base for all information about Tesoro CRM.
ai_chat.error_message: Sorry, something went wrong. Try a question like: "What does Tesoro cost?" or "How does lead management work?"
ai_chat.pricing_response: Tesoro CRM costs €99 per month for up to 10 users. No setup fees, no commitment. You can try it free for 14 days!
ai_chat.trial_response: You can try Tesoro CRM free for 14 days! No credit card required. Want a personal Proof of Value? Click below to schedule an appointment.
ai_chat.contact_response: Have a specific question? Contact us! We're happy to help.
ai_chat.found_info: I found information that answers your question.

form.success: Thank you! We'll contact you soon.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
